en: Behind every successful man there's a lot of unsuccessful years.
cn: 每个牛B的成功者都经历过苦B的岁月。(鲍博.布朗)

en: A fellow doesn't last long on what he has done. He's got to keep on delivering as he goes along.
cn: 靠过去完成的无法让人保有成功，必须在路上持续交出成绩。

en: The difference between who you are and who you want to be is what you do.
cn: 你是什么样的人和你想成为什么样的之间的差距就是，你做了什么。

en: Good luck is when an opportunity comes along and you're prepared for it.
cn: 好运就是当机会来临时，你早已做好了准备。

en: They say a person needs just three things to be truly happy in this world: someone to love, something to do, and something to hope for.
cn: 据说一个人在这个世上获得真正的幸福需要三件事情：有人爱，有事做，有所期待。

en: In the end, it's not the years in your life that count. It's the life in your years.
cn: 最终，重要的不是活了多少年，而是这些年你怎么活。--林肯

en: Ever tried. Ever failed. No matter. Try Again. Fail again. Fail better.
cn: 努力过，失败过，没关系，屡战屡败，屡败屡战，每一次失败都比上一次更好。

en: Go confidently in the direction of your dreams. Live the life you've imagined.
cn: 自信的朝你梦想的方向前进，去过你所想要的生活。

en: If we did all the things we are capable of doing, we would literally astound ourselves.
cn: 如果把我们能做到的都做了，最终连我们自己都会被吓到。

en: Generosity is its own form of power.
cn: 别低估了慷慨的力量。——《纸牌屋》

en: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
cn: 成功不是终点，失败也并非末日，最重要的是继续前进的勇气。

en: Success is not guaranteed. It is not handed to you. Success is earned.
cn: 成功无法保证，并非唾手可得。成功必须靠自己去争取。

en: The turning point in the process of growing up is when you discover the core of strength within you that survives all hurt.ehind
cn: 当你从内心深处找到一种可以忍受一切痛苦的坚强力量时，你的成长历程就会出现飞跃。

en: Sometimes things have to fall apart to make way for better things.
cn: 有时候要到达谷底，才会慢慢变好。

en: There is only one thing that makes a dream impossible to achieve: the fear of failure.
cn: 世界上只有一样东西可以阻止梦想实现，那就是害怕失败。

en: If you believe in yourself and with a tiny pinch of good luck, all your dreams can come true.
cn: 如果你相信自己，然后再加上一点点运气，那你所有梦想就都能实现。

en: Whatever is worth doing is worth doing well.
cn: 任何值得做的事就值得把它做好!

en: Do one thing at a time, and do well.
cn: 一次只做一件事，做到最好!

en: You make the failure complete when you stop trying.
cn: 当你停止尝试的时候，你就完全失败了。

en: Will, work and wait are the pyramidal cornerstones for success.
cn: 意志工作和等待是成功的金字塔的基石。

en: Success often depends upon knowing how long it will take to succeed.
cn: 成功常常取决于知道需要多久才能成功。

en: Think great thoughts and you will be great!
cn: 心怀伟大的理想，你将会变得伟大。

en: Only those who have the patience to do simple things perfectly ever acquire the skill to do difficult things easily.
cn: 只有有耐心圆满完成简单工作的人，才能够轻而易举的完成困难的事。

en: A man can succeed at almost anything for which he has unlimited enthusiasm.
cn: 无论何事，只要对它有无限的热情你就能取得成功。

en: Youth means limitless possibilities.
cn: 年轻就是无限的可能。

en: Knowledge makes humble, ignorance makes proud.
cn: 博学使人谦逊，无知使人骄傲。

en: Go for it! Just do it!
cn: 加油!向前冲!做了再说!

en: A man is only as good as what he loves.
cn: 一个人要用他所爱的东西有多好来衡量。

en: Live well, love lots, and laugh often.
cn: 善待生活，热爱一切，经常开怀大笑。

en: The best preparation for tomorrow is doing your best today.
cn: 对明天做好的准备就是今天做到最好!

en: Wise men learn by other men's mistakes; fools by their own.
cn: 聪明人从别人的错误中学得教训;笨人则自己付出代价。他山之石可以攻玉。
